snippet.title: Ember Sword Q&A with Joris and Loren (streamed on Twitch)
snippet.description:
This is a past broadcast from our Twitch channel: https://twitch.tv/embersword

Join our community Discord server to have your questions answered for upcoming Q&As: https://discord.com/invite/EmberSword

Quick links:
00:00 Introduction

00:56 Will the roadmap, a closed beta for 2020, be expected in this month or later this year?

02:34 In PvP, will heavier weapons have quick options to catch opponents or will it be a read-based moveset?

04:25 Is there still a land auction or has it become a sale? If not, when?

06:14 How large is the world of Ember Sword compared to other MMO’s?

08:29 While working on the game, what is the most fun and the least fun?

13:26 What in the game are you most proud of so far?

14:14 Will we know if a land has a special trait before buying it?

16:15 Can we expect some good PvE content such as Dungeons etc.?

18:55 What activities in the game do you hope will keep people playing?

23:32 If I kill someone in a PvP zone, what rewards do I get?

24:34 Will Land owners be able to interact with each other? 

27:08 What are the benefits of owning Land of each type in Ember Sword?

30:50 Random Twitch questions.

31:07 Will you prevent users from owning too much land?

32:39 Will there be EPIC bows in the game?

33:30 Outro
